typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SursaLocalaBlob
SursaLocalaBlob filter(Column_1=='alex') ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
